task.title: How to Find Parking
task.shortdesc: Parking around the Virginia Tech campus can be tricky, but with AirClassroom's guidance, you and your group will be able to park without any hassles.

context.p: You will not be able to park on campus without a parking or visitor's permit Monday-Friday between 7am and 5pm.

step.cmd: Request a visitor's parking permit from the Virginia Tech Visitor between 7:30am and 6pm.

info.p: The Visitor Center is located at 925 Prices Fork Road, Blacksburg, VA, 24060.
The visitor's parking permit will only allow you to park in spots labelled for Faculty, Staff, Visitor, or Student.

step.cmd: Park your vehicle in the parking garage at 1330 Perry St, Blacksburg, VA, 24060.

info.note: Do not park in handicap spots or emergency vehicle spots.
